content.description: Starts off the nose of the "Little Prick" boulder. Small ledge for stand start then traverses opposite direct of "Little Prick" route and links up with tan streak on "Sender Caps" route.
content.location: Found on the 'Little Prick' boulder which is downhill from 'Cephaly' and closer to the parking area.

content.description: Follow the tan streak through two large flakes topping out directly above the final flake.
content.location: On the 'Little Prick' boulder. problem starts at the back of where the two boulders meet (cave).

content.description: On the Power plant boulder. Route starts on the ledge for the sit start of placender and moves left on small crimps and heel hooks toward the arete. A sloper and pull straight up takes you to easier terrain up the arete to the top.
content.location: Power plant is farthest up hill at the atrium area to the right of the cephaly boulder

content.description:
Standing Start V-1

Sit Start V-2

Middle of the boulder, follow move straight up to the declivity in the top. Follow the ample edges through the middle to sloping edges up top where your foot holds miraculously disappear.

In the South Facing tip of Cherts til it hurts boulder. Start with left hand on low angle crimp. Right hand high on sloping ledge. Lever your heel up to the ledge and start crimping and slapping your hands up the nose and left to a large pocket whereby you can begin to get feet under and pull for the top. First climbed in November.
content.protection: Sharp rock will keep you from sliding off.
content.location: Cherts til it hurts boulder south facing nose of the boulder. Start low under the nose.

content.description:
Start near the tan stripe of 'Sender Caps' and traverse right on crimps toward the tip of the boulder. Once there pull up through the top.

Two boulders sit next to each other. Little Prick starts back near the cave where a porcupine appears to be nesting.
content.location: 'Little Prick' boulder is downhill from 'Cephaly' and closer to the parking area. Locate the downhill side of the boulders where they meet. Start here and move low along the boulder (right) out to the point and up to top out.

content.description: Starts on the lip of the undercut approximately at the feet of 'Pick Pocket' on the right side of the  'Cephaly Boulder'. Use the small crimps to traverse left toward the tip of the boulder where a good 4 finger pocket gains a slight rest. Then pull straight up to a mono and slopers to the top.
content.location: just left of 'Pick Pocket' on the 'Cephaly' boulder

content.description: Start on a pinch and a side-pull at slightly above head height. Move straight up through crimps to an easy top out.
'Cherts' is a low boulder down hill from the power plant. 'Hurts' starts at a big chert piece and traverses right out to the tip of the boulder and then up over the lip to the top.
on the left hand side of the power plant boulder is a sloping face with easy holds. Start next to a low bush and move up and right to the arete on good holds. then to the top
On the far right side of the cephaly boulder. start with a sloper and a side pull. Stand on tricky feet up to a large pocket. move feet and continue straight up to the top.
content.location: cephaly boulder farthest right above the undercut of the boulder.
